logbinres.comment: Resoving power for common spectral binnin. A linear binning wavelength integral is estimated as wl_min/R

wl_min.comment: Shortest wavelength in simulation used for binning input spectra

wl_max.comment: Shortest wavelength in simulation used for binning input spectra

output_directory.comment: output directory to store sim images in FITs format or data processed results in pickle format

sim_output_type.comment: 1 = process through pipeline and store as pickle file, 2 = do not process through pipeline and store image stack as a FITS file

pipeline_bin_size.comment: size of fixed-bins in pixel columns if fixed-bin selected

pipeline_apply_mask.comment: apply an aperture mask or not

pipeline_ap_factor.comment: if mask applied, width in units of Flambda

pipeline_ap_shape.comment: rect = rectangular mask where width = ApFactor*F*lambda(max), wav = wavelength dependent mask where width = ApFactor * F *lambda. rect is default

useAllen.comment: if result_type is 0, this selects use of Allen analysis

useReduced.comment: selects reduced number of bins in data pipline for speed

use_fast.comment: uses cropped arrays that reduce simulation and pipeline time

PointingModel.comment: Jitter PSD in units of deg**2/Hz

adjust_rms.comment: activate to adjust RMS of desired jitter

pointing_rms.comment: RMS of desired jitter if adjust_rms is True

star_spectrum_model.comment: If 'simple', use a Planck function for the stellar sed. If 'model': use Phoenix

star_spectrum_mag_norm.comment: 0 or 1: use a star spectrum normalized to given magnitude

EnableAll.comment: enables all noise sources and applies PRNU: if ApplyRandomPRNU is 1 it will apply random grid else it applies the standard grid

DisableAll.comment: disables all noise sources and does not apply PRNU, overides enable all

ApplyPRNU.comment: If 1 uses a matrix of QE variations

ApplyRandomPRNU.comment: If 1 generates a random grid of QE variations

QErms.comment: if ApplyRandomPRNU is true, this is the rms variation applied

QErms_uncert.comment: if ApplyRandomPRNU is true, this is the uncertainty applied

EnableAll.comment: enables all target and background sources and DC

DisableAll.comment: disables all target and background sources and DC, overides enable all

apply_lc.comment: apply a transit light curve; if false will do an OOT observation

useLDC.comment: activate use of limb darkening code

apply_lo_dens_LC.comment: if 0 uses instantaneous light curve, if 1 uses intergrated light curve

use_T14.comment: if true uses T14 as the basis for the total observation time; if false uses obs_time or n_exp

before_transit.comment: fraction of T14 for pre-transit observation

after_transit.comment: fraction of T14 for post-transit observation

obs_time.comment: in hrs; total observing time if OOT chosen, and if > 0 overides n_exp; set to 0 to use n_exp

n_exp.comment: number of exposures that sets the total observation time if use_T14 is false

optical_surface.comment: number of OTE surfaces and temp

telescope_effective_diameter.comment: from Pandeia data json file giving collecting area of 25.4009m2
